from DateTime import DateTime
 
 person = context
 portal = person.getPortalObject()
 tag = '%s_updateOpenSaleOrder' % person.getUid()
 activate_kw = {'tag': tag}
 if portal.portal_activities.countMessageWithTag(tag) > 0:
 # nothing to do
 return
 
 def storeWorkflowComment(document, comment):
 portal.portal_workflow.doActionFor(document, 'edit_action', comment=comment)
 
 add_kw_kw, modify_kw_kw, remove_id_list = context.Person_getOpenSaleOrderDifference(
 remove_hosting_list,
 add_kw_list,
 start_date_tuple_list)
 
 now = DateTime()
 previous_open_sale_order = portal.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 default_destination_uid=person.getUid(),
 portal_type="Open Sale Order",
 validation_state="validated")
 
 if not(add_kw_kw or modify_kw_kw or remove_id_list):
 return # nothing to do
 
 open_order_edit_kw = {
 'effective_date': now,
 'activate_kw': activate_kw,
 }
 if previous_open_sale_order is None:
 open_sale_order_template = portal.restrictedTraverse(
 portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredOpenSaleOrderTemplate())
 open_sale_order = open_sale_order_template.Base_createCloneDocument(batch_mode=1)
 open_order_edit_kw.update({
 'destination': person.getRelativeUrl(),
 'destination_decision': person.getRelativeUrl(),
 'title': "SlapOS Subscription Open Sale Order",
 })
 else:
 open_sale_order = previous_open_sale_order.Base_createCloneDocument(batch_mode=1)
 previous_open_sale_order.setExpirationDate(now, activate_kw=activate_kw)
 open_sale_order.edit(**open_order_edit_kw)
 open_sale_order.order(activate_kw=activate_kw)
 open_sale_order.validate(activate_kw=activate_kw)
 
 open_sale_order_line_template = portal.restrictedTraverse(
 portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredOpenSaleOrderLineTemplate())
 for kw in add_kw_kw.itervalues():
 explanation_list = kw.pop('explanation', [])
 line = open_sale_order_line_template.Base_createCloneDocument(batch_mode=1,
 destination=open_sale_order)
 line.edit(activate_kw=activate_kw, **kw)
 for explanation in explanation_list:
 storeWorkflowComment(line, explanation)
 
 for hs, kw in modify_kw_kw.iteritems():
 line = [q for q in open_sale_order.contentValues() if q.getAggregate(portal_type='Hosting Subscription') == hs][0]
 explanation_list = kw.pop('explanation', [])
 line.edit(activate_kw=activate_kw, **kw)
 for explanation in explanation_list:
 storeWorkflowComment(line, explanation)
 
 open_sale_order.deleteContent([q[0] for q in remove_id_list])
 for explanation in remove_id_list:
 storeWorkflowComment(open_sale_order, explanation[1])
